official_title: Social Determinants of Sleep and Obesity: Culturally Informing a Sleep Extension Intervention for African American Adults
inclusion_criteria:
* Not meeting Physical Activity Guidelines
* age range: 21 to 65 years
* body mass index range: 25.0 to 40 kg/m2
* average self-reported habitual sleep duration of â‰¤6 hours
* self-identify as Black or African American.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Self-reported organ-related disorder (COPD, cardiac arrhythmia, gastro-esophageal disorder)
* pregnant or less than 4 months postpartum
* infant living in household less than 1 year old
